Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: RESULTS : A total of 155 ( 75 . 6 % ) of 205 patients had thrombocytopenia before transplantation , significantly influenced by Model of End - Stage Liver Disease score and liver cirrhosis .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| thrombocytopenia |
| liver cirrhosis |

Explanation:

* Thrombocytopenia: A condition characterized by an abnormally low number of blood cell fragments called platelets.
* Liver cirrhosis: A late stage of scarring (fibrosis) of the liver caused by many forms of liver diseases and conditions.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| thrombocytopenia |
| liver cirrhosis |

Explanation:

* Thrombocytopenia: A condition characterized by an abnormally low number of blood cell fragments called platelets.
* Liver cirrhosis: A late stage of scarring (fibrosis) of the liver caused by many forms of liver diseases and conditions.

Model for End-Stage Liver Disease (MELD) score is not a disease, it is a scoring system for assessing the severity of chronic liver disease. Therefore, I have not included it in the table.
